Several decades ago, the water dragon Fafurion rose up and caused great devastation in these parts. The Goddess Eva was so thankful that she gave him a magic sword. In the years that followed, it became the symbol for the Lord of Innadril. That is the *Sword of Othelotte*. But recently the sword has disappeared... No one, not even the lord himself, knows its whereabouts.
